title: Tejaswini AnanthKumar
subtitle:
From a refugee who had to leave all  he had behind to the deputy prime Minster of India,Bhishma pitamha of Indian politics.
What an inspiring&motivating journey Dada. You have been our leader, guru & father figure to #Ananthkumar&me. Wishing you a very Happy birthday #Advanijipic.twitter.com/5vTNSrlxIT

title: Lian Buan
subtitle: LOOK: DOJ's notice of recognition of Bahari as a refugee. The notice informs her of the privileges that come with the status, such as a DOLE certification should she want to work here. pic.twitter.com/WZxAZx9bHZ

title: Louise Donovan
subtitle:
Refugee volunteers raising one flag across the #Rohingya settlements this morning. 

This is the lowest warning signal of a potential #cyclone threat. 

Volunteers are mobilized and delivering community messaging. 

UNHCR & partners are coordinating a potential emergency responsepic.twitter.com/uaLXvAqYNu

title: Chowkidar Pankaj Mishra
subtitle:
Floods came.
They changed the land.

Cyclones came.
They adapted.

Landslides came.
They showed their resilience.

Water was scarce.
They deployed solar-powered pumps.

Rohingya refugees have become #ClimateAction pros.

Awareness of Rohingya Refugee's Pan Rohingya pic.twitter.com/7OQMRR6EJ9

title: USAID Bangladesh
subtitle: The e-voucher system, implemented by @WFP is helping bring efficient food distribution to thousands of Rohingya refugees in Cox’s Bazar. Much of the food comes directly from community retailers to support the local economy. pic.twitter.com/fvL7B56alm

title: Mercy Tembon
subtitle: Honored to welcome @WorldBank Executive Directors to #Bangladesh. Yesterday, we visited the world’s largest refugee camp, Kutupalong in Cox’s Bazar.
